oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

searchConfigurationId.name: searchConfigurationId
searchConfigurationId.description: ID of the search configuration to retrieve
searchConfigurationId.ai_hint: ID of the search configuration to retrieve

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
add_summary_to_metadata
options.description: Whether to include field summary statistics in the response

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

search.name: search
search.description: Search language string to execute, in Splunk's Search Processing Language
search.ai_hint: Search language string to execute, in Splunk's Search Processing Language

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

searchJobId.name: searchJobId
searchJobId.description: ID of the search whose results to retrieve
searchJobId.ai_hint: ID of the search whose results to retrieve

filters.name: filters

options.name: keyValueMatch
options.description: Key-value pair to match against. Example: if "Key" is set to user and "Field" is set to john, only the results where user is john will be returned.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

roles.name: roles
roles.description: Comma-separated list of roles to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
roles.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of roles to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

userId.name: userId
userId.description: ID of the user to update
userId.ai_hint: ID of the user to update

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: roles
options.description: Comma-separated list of roles to assign to the user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'firedAlert' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'searchConfiguration' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'searchConfiguration' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchConfigurationId'
IF resource == 'searchConfiguration' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchConfigurationId'
IF resource == 'searchConfiguration' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'searchConfiguration' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'searchConfiguration' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'searchJob' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'searchJob' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'search'
IF resource == 'searchJob' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'searchJob' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchJobId'
IF resource == 'searchJob' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchJobId'
IF resource == 'searchJob' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'searchJob' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'searchJob' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'searchResult' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'searchResult' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchJobId'
IF resource == 'searchResult' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'searchResult' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'searchResult' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'searchResult' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'roles'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
